Quality Inspection for Delivery and Retu: Inspection lot is to be created manually
Internal Activity Should Be Allocated Internally
Quality notification is activated from defects
Inspection lot completion is triggered using QM-IDI
Inspection completion is to be forced
Results for operation must be recorded
Inspection results are copied to general characteristics
Inspection before goods issue is to be carried out
Enter defects from the inspection lot
Inspection lot completion for skip is to be made
Inspection lot status allows a goods issue
Enter defects from the inspection lot
Results for the sample are to be recorded
